long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: [ 81%] Generating std/digest/ripemd.o cd /builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src && /builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/build/bin/ldc2 --output-o -c -I/builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/runtime/druntime/src -I/builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/runtime/druntime/src/gc /builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/runtime/phobos/std/digest/ripemd.d -of/builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/build/runtime/std/digest/ripemd.o -w -d -relocation-model=pic -O3 -release -I/builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/runtime/phobos /builddir/build/BUILD/ldc-0.16.1-src/runtime/phobos/std/digest/ripemd.d(242): Error: template instance littleEndianToNative!uint template 'littleEndianToNative' is not defined runtime/CMakeFiles/phobos2-ldc.dir/build.make:550: recipe for target 'runtime/std/digest/ripemd.o' failed make[2]: *** [runtime/std/digest/ripemd.o] Error 1
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): ldc-0.16.1-77.fc24
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. ppc-koji build --scratch f24 ldc-0.16.1-77.fc24.src.rpm 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:
ppc support should be fixed in ldc-0.17.2-1.fc25
